title.narrative: 2018 - Youth Employment Indicator Project with ILO YouthStat

description.narrative: The project will utilize the ILO’s repository of labour force survey microdatasets to generate a new, continuously-updated YouthSTATS database with wide global coverage over time. This will greatly enhance the body of evidence pertaining to the situation of youth in labour markets around the world and will facilitate new research and better-informed policies to help improve the situation among the most vulnerable youth populations across the world.
